thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value good location
thread.title_full: Good value good location - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ADZ552
title: Good value good location
text: We stayed had a great weekend and enjoyed our stay at this holiday in. All the staff where really nice and helpful. Our room was on the top floor and the view was good of city skyline. Our room was clean and tidy and was cleaned while we were there. Great value. Its situated between Victoria and pimlico tube stations so great central location
